statements: SELECT * FROM tasks;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE assigned_to = 'John Doe';
SELECT task_name, assigned_to FROM tasks ORDER BY task_name DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM tasks WHERE task_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE task_name LIKE 'Complete%';
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT task_name, assigned_to FROM tasks WHERE task_description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM tasks ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE assigned_to = 'John Doe' AND task_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT task_id, task_name, assigned_to FROM tasks WHERE task_name LIKE 'Complete%' ORDER BY task_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT task_name, user_id FROM tasks;
SELECT task_name FROM tasks WHERE task_id > 3;
SELECT user_id, task_name FROM tasks ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(task_id) FROM tasks GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY task_name DESC;
SELECT task_name, user_id FROM tasks WHERE task_name LIKE 'Do%' AND user_id IN (1, 2) ORDER BY user_id ASC, task_name;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(task_id) AS task_count FROM tasks GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(task_id) > 2;
SELECT t.task_name, u.username FROM tasks t JOIN users u ON t.user_id = u.user_id WHERE t.user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE task_name ILIKE '%important%' OR task_name ILIKE '%urgent%' ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM tasks;
SELECT task_description, task_id FROM tasks ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, task_description FROM tasks WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, task_description, user_name FROM tasks INNER JOIN users ON tasks.user_id = users.user_id;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT task_description, user_name FROM tasks JOIN users ON tasks.user_id = users.user_id;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM assigned_tasks WHERE task_id = 1);
SELECT task_id, task_description FROM tasks ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT user_name, task_description FROM users JOIN tasks ON users.user_id = tasks.user_id ORDER BY user_name ASC, task_description DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE user_id > 3;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'John';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id > 5 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT task_name, user_id FROM tasks WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(task_id) AS total_tasks FROM user_tasks GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM task_categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT tasks.task_name, users.username FROM tasks JOIN users ON tasks.user_id = users.user_id;
SELECT users.username, tasks.task_name FROM tasks JOIN users ON tasks.user_id = users.user_id ORDER BY users.username DESC;
SELECT tasks.task_name, task_categories.category_name FROM tasks LEFT JOIN task_categories ON tasks.task_id = task_categories.category_id;
